context: At the International Space Exploration Agency (ISEA), astronauts must meet specific certification requirements. If an astronaut completes the zero-gravity simulation (wuvog), then they are qualified for orbital missions (reji). Passing the radiation exposure test (qaqdoq) certifies them for deep space missions (lafdiga). The advanced navigation course (tyrexiqivi) ensures mastery of interstellar travel protocols (niccoylutmyk), which in turn guarantees deep space certification if the radiation test is passed. Completing the psychological evaluation (beewyube) confirms readiness for prolonged isolation (moydy), establishing that interstellar protocol mastery leads to deep space certification when combined with radiation test passing.
question: What can be validly concluded from the given information if all conditions are met?
answers: A. If an astronaut completes the psychological evaluation, then mastering interstellar protocols ensures deep space certification when the radiation test is passed
B. Completing the zero-gravity simulation qualifies the astronaut for orbital missions
C. If an astronaut is certified for deep space missions, then they must have passed the radiation exposure test
D. The psychological evaluation directly certifies astronauts for deep space missions without additional requirements
label: A
z3:
Implies(And(tyrexiqivi, Implies(tyrexiqivi,
        Implies(qaqdoq, lafdiga))), Implies(qaqdoq, lafdiga))

Implies(And(Implies(tyrexiqivi, niccoylutmyk), Implies(niccoylutmyk,
        Implies(qaqdoq, lafdiga))), Implies(tyrexiqivi,
        Implies(qaqdoq, lafdiga)))

Implies(And(beewyube, Implies(beewyube,
        Implies(niccoylutmyk,
                Implies(qaqdoq,
                        lafdiga)))), Implies(niccoylutmyk,
        Implies(qaqdoq, lafdiga)))

Implies(And(LogicVar_8_Premise, Implies(LogicVar_8_Premise,
        Implies(beewyube,
                Implies(niccoylutmyk,
                        Implies(qaqdoq,
                                lafdiga))))), Implies(beewyube,
        Implies(niccoylutmyk,
                Implies(qaqdoq,
                        lafdiga))))
distractors: 不充分前提/忽略关键假设（illogical_reasoning）

context: In the certification process for cybersecurity analysts at TechSecure Inc., candidates must meet specific requirements to obtain various credentials. If a candidate passes the qioxawalil vulnerability assessment, they automatically receive zydyne certification. Additionally, completing the domra penetration testing course qualifies candidates for xymaril advanced training. Those who complete xymaril training become eligible for qemrurbob threat analysis specialization, provided they also have pahqecuz clearance. The company policy states that qywanehoe leadership approval is required before any candidate can pursue qemrurbob specialization, and this approval is always granted when all prerequisites are met.
question: What can be validly concluded if Alex has passed the qioxawalil vulnerability assessment, completed the domra penetration testing course, obtained pahqecuz clearance, and received qywanehoe leadership approval?
answers: A. Alex will obtain zydyne certification
B. Alex is eligible for qemrurbob threat analysis specialization
C. Alex completed xymaril advanced training but may not qualify for zydyne certification
D. Alex requires additional approval beyond qywanehoe for qemrurbob specialization
label: A
z3: Implies(And(Implies(qioxawalil, zydyne), LogicVar_3_Premise, LogicVar_4_Premise), Implies(qioxawalil, zydyne))

Implies(And(domra, Implies(domra,
        Implies(qioxawalil,
                zydyne))), Implies(qioxawalil, zydyne))

Implies(And(Implies(domra, xymaril), Implies(xymaril,
        Implies(qioxawalil,
                zydyne))), Implies(domra,
        Implies(qioxawalil,
                zydyne)))

Implies(And(qemrurbob, Implies(qemrurbob,
        Implies(xymaril,
                Implies(qioxawalil,
                        zydyne)))), Implies(xymaril,
        Implies(qioxawalil,
                zydyne)))

Implies(And(LogicVar_8_Premise, Implies(LogicVar_8_Premise,

                        Implies(qioxawalil,
                                zydyne))))), Implies(qemrurbob,

                        zydyne))))
